transforms.code:
dataset = system.dataset.toPyDataSet(value)
	failed = False
	
	for row in dataset:
	    dataType = row[3]
	    savedValue = row[4]
	    hiLimit = row[10]
	    loLimit = row[12]
	
	    if dataType in ["Integer", "Float"] and savedValue is not None:
	        savedValue = float(savedValue)
	        hiLimit = float(hiLimit)
	        loLimit = float(loLimit)
	
	        if savedValue > hiLimit or savedValue < loLimit:
	            failed = True
	            break
	
	return(failed)

config.script:
TestID = self.view.custom.TestValues.TestID
	PartID = self.view.custom.PartsValues.ID
	TestedBy = self.session.props.auth.user.userName
	IsPass = self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("Checkbox").props.selected
	Notes = self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("Top").getChild("Middle").getChild("TextArea").props.text
	MaterialLotID = self.view.custom.MaterialValues.MaterialLotNumber
	AttributeValues = self.view.custom.AttributeData.OutputValues
	
	mes.quality.sp.updateTest(TestID = TestID, IsPass = IsPass, AttributeValues = AttributeValues, PartID = PartID, MaterialLotID = MaterialLotID, Notes = Notes)
	
	messageType = 'refreshQualityTable' 
	payload = {}
	system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType, payload, view = 'session')

	system.perspective.closePopup("AttributeScreen")
